alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 08 at 11:16AM EDT until further notice by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Much of Rhode Island and Central and Eastern Massachusetts * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches has occurred in much of the region. Additional rainfall with thunderstorms is possible through this evening. Excessive runoff can result in flooding of rivers, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Western Essex
